com.hula.web.velocity

Class RelativeClasspathResourceLoader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.velocity.runtime.resource.loader.ResourceLoader
      • org.apache.velocity.runtime.resource.loader.ClasspathResourceLoader
        • com.hula.web.velocity.RelativeClasspathResourceLoader

  • public class RelativeClasspathResourceLoader
extends org.apache.velocity.runtime.resource.loader.ClasspathResourceLoader
    A custom Velocity Resource Loader for loading templates from a path relative to a classpath location.

    This is required because the Velocity ClasspathResourceLoader expects templates either in the WEB-INF/classes directory, or bundled into a jar file. This allows us to serve templates from an alternative folder within the web app, by specifying a path relative to the WebappClassLoader.

    For example, specifying relativecp.path=../scripts means the resource loader will look in WEB-INF/classes/../scripts, which resolves to WEB-INF/scripts

    Path specification needs to happen within the ResourceLoader (as opposed to when calling Velocity.getTemplate(...)) to support references within a template to another template.
